con:part.con:content:
<wsdl:definitions name="LoyaltyMemberTransactionService" targetNamespace="http://www.ventana.com/LoyaltyMemberTransactionService/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://www.ventana.com/LoyaltyMemberTransactionService/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:documentation>LoyaltyMemberTransactionService Service is used to retrieve the Posted Activies and their Eligible Mileages (AEM,EQM,EQD,EQS) from Ventana. This Service has below Operation.
1. RetrieveMemberActivityList: This is used to retrieve the Posted Activies from Ventana. AACOM and AACORN will use this operation to retrieve the posted Transactions and their mileages to display in Account Summary Page.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.ventana.com/LoyaltyMemberTransactionService/"> <xsd:element name="RetrieveMemberTransactionListRequest" type="tns:RetrieveMemberTransactionListRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="RetrieveMemberTransactionListResponse" type="tns:RetrieveMemberTransactionListResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="RetrieveMemberTransactionListRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RequestInfo" type="tns:RequestInfoType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="MemberNumber" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AAdvantage Number of the Member e.g. 3CJW014</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="7"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ActivityFromDate" type="xsd:date" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date from which the Activities have to be filtered in YYYY-MM-DD Format. The time zone has to be Local Time Zone.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ActivityToDate" type="xsd:date" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date till which the Activities have to be filtered in YYYY-MM-DD Format. The time zone has to be Local Time Zone.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MarketingPartnerCode" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Two digit Partner Code. E.g. AA,BA etc.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="3"/> <xsd:minLength value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TransactionType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Represent the Type of Activity, The Values allowed are "Flight", "Non-Flight" and "Award". This is used to Filter the Activities based on th type of the Activity</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Flight"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Non-Flight"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Award"/> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ActivityType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Represent the Sub Type of Activity. This is used to filter Non Flight Activities eg. Bank/Credit Card, Car, Destination, Hotel, Loan, Refund, Promotion etc.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Adjustment"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Airline"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Archived Miles"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="Award Issuance"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="Bank/Credit"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Card"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Bulk Statemented"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="Car"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Decrement"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Destination"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EP/Platinum"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Exp Miles"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Deferred"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Expire Mileage"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="Expire Miles.Financial"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="Hotel"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Loan"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Loan Repayment"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="Merchandise"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Miscellaneous"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="Negative Miles Adjustment"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="Promotion"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Refund"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Telecommunication"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="Transfer"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Unexpire Miles"></xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ATTRIB01" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ATTRIB02" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ATTRIB03" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RetrieveMemberTransactionListResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Retrieve Member Activity List Response Complex Type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RetrieveMemberTransactionListResponseStatus" type="tns:ResponseStatusType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Error Code returned from the Service in a successful response.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TransactionSummary" type="tns:TransactionSummaryType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Summary Information in the Response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="TransactionInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TransactionType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>At Summary level, This Field Represents the Type of Summary Transaction At Detail level, This Field Represents the Type of Detail Transaction . Possible Values are "Flight","Non-Flight" and "Award"</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"></xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ActivityType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Represent the Sub Type of Activity. This Field is used to filter Activities eg. Bank/Credit Card, Car, Destination, Hotel, Loan, Refund, Promotion etc.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"></xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PNRNumber" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Six digit PNR Number for which the Award is issued or the PNR Number of Flight Iternarary.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="6"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TicketNumber" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>13 digit numeric Ticket Number. Always send the "Prime Ticket Number".</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="13"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EntitlementNumber" type="xsd:int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This should be the sequential # (Sabre: Entitlement #). For conjunctive tickets with 6 segments , this should be (1,2,3,4,5 and 6)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Origin" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Represents Origin of the First Flight in the Ticket with Earliest Activity Date at SummaryLevel Represents Origin Airport Code for each segment at Summary Activity Level.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Destination" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Represents the Destination of the First Flight in the Ticket with Earliest Activity Date at Summary Level Represents the Destination Airport Code for each Segment at Summary Actiivity Detail Level</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ActivityDate" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" type="xsd:date"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Activity Date of the Flight in the Ticket with Earliest Activity Date in YYYY-MM-DD Format at Summary Activity Date of the Flight or Non Flight Activity in YYYY-MM-DD Format at Summary Activity.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MarketingPartnerCode" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Marketing Carrier Code of the Flight in the Ticket with Earliest Activity Date at Summary Level Marketing Carrier Code of the Flight at Summary Activity Level.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FlightNumber" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Flght Number of the Flight in the Ticket with Earliest Activity Date at Summary Level. Flght Number of the Flight at Summary Activity Level.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BookingClassCode" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Booking Class of the Flight in the Ticket with Earliest Activity Date at Summary Level Booking Class of the Flight at Summary Activity Level
. Eg. J,Q,D,I etc. a</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ClassofServiceCode" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Class of Service Code the Flight in the Ticket with Earliest Activity Date at Summary Level Class of Service Code the Flight at Summary Activity Level
E.g. C,Y,F,W</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PostedDate" type="xsd:date" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Posted Date of the Flight in the Ticket with Earliest Activity Date in YYYY-MM-DD Format at Summary Level Posted Date of the Flight in YYYY-MM-DD Format at Summary Activity Level</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AccrualMethod" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Method of Accrual. Possible values are "Fare", "Distance".</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AccrualReason" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This represents the Reason for Accrual in case of Opaque Fares, bulk Fares, LAP Infant Postings etc. The Possible Values are. Cap Applied Award Ticket Special Fare Data Unavailable Manual Posting Lap Infant Lifetime AirPass Exception Applies</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FlightMiles" type="xsd:int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Flight Distance of the Flight Activity</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EligibleFare" type="xsd:int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The EligibleFare for the Flight Activity</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TransactionDescription" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This gives the more information about the Transaction. Eg. AVIATOR MC EVERYDAY PURCHASES</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="100"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MergedFrom" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Field will display the Member Number from which the Transaction is Merged from</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ActionCode" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>"This Field displays the Fare Type of the Transaction. Eg. AF, OF etc. AF represents Award Fare OF represents Opaque Fare."</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EarnedMileages" type="tns:MileageType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AwardType" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of the Award. The Possible Values are A - AIRLINE AWARD B - AIRLINE AWARD C - CAR AWARD D - DESTINATION (RESORT) AWARD H - HOTEL AWARD M - MERCHANDISE AWARD Z - DUMMY AWARD</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AwardStatus" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Award Status. Represents whether the Award is issued ,reinstated or refunded. The Poosible Valiues are "IS","RS","RF"</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AwardCetificateNumber" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Certificate Number generated for the Award</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AwardExpirationDate" type="xsd:date" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Expiration Date of the Award in YYYY-MM-DD Format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AwardReinstatedDate" type="xsd:date" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date when the Award is Reinstated in YYYY-MM-DD Format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AwardRefudedDate" type="xsd:date" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date when the Award is Refunded in YYYY-MM-DD Format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AwardTravelDate" type="xsd:date" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Travel Date for the Award Activity in YYYY-MM-DD Format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NameonCertificate" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Passenger Name on the Certificate.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TransactionId" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>row_id of the Transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServiceFaultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ErrorCode" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ErrorMessage" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ServiceFault" type="tns:ServiceFaultType"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Ping_Input" type="tns:Ping_InputType"/> <xsd:element name="Ping_Output" type="tns:Ping_OuputType"/> <xsd:complexType name="Ping_InputType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Operation" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Ping"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Ping_OuputType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PingResponse" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MileageType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TotalEliteQualifyingDollars" type="xsd:int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total EQD, Summed up for all segments for a Ticket Summary at Summary Level Total EQD Earned on a segment at the Summary Activity Level,</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BaseEliteQualifyingDollars" type="xsd:int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Base EQD, Summed up for all segments for a Ticket Summary Base EQD Earned on a segment at the Summary Activity Level,</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BaseEQDMultiplier" type="xsd:float" maxOccurs="1" <wsdl:definitions name="EarnCalculator" targetNamespace="http://www.ventana.com/EarnCalculator/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://www.ventana.com/EarnCalculator/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:documentation>Ventana Earn Calculator Service is used to retrieve the Eligible Mileages (AEM,EQM,EQD,EQS) for an iternary. This Service has below Operation.
1. EarnCalculator: This is used to calculate the Eligible mileage during the Booking Path. AACOM and AACORN will use this operation to retrieve the mileages in the Review and Pay Page.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.ventana.com/EarnCalculator/"> <xsd:element name="EarnCalculatorRequest" type="tns:EarnCalculatorRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="EarnCalculatorResponse" type="tns:EarnCalculatroResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="EarnCalculatorRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ServiceName" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the Service. Provide the Value "LoyaltyEarnCalculatorService"</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="LoyaltyEarnCalculatorService"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ServiceVersion" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specify the Service Version e.g. 1.0</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ClientId" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates the Client Using the Service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AuditId" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Represents the Unique Identifier for the Request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PassengerInformation" type="tns:PassengerInformationType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="TicketInfoRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TicketNumber" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>10 digit numeric Ticket Number. Always the Prime Ticket # or Randomly generated Unique Identifier in that request in the booking Path.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TicketIssueDate" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Needed for any request on existing reservations Not needed during Booking Path (would be defaulted to current date for booking path). The format is DD-MON-YYYY</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="10"/> <xsd:maxLength value="11"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="OriginalDateofIssue" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="10"/> <xsd:maxLength value="11"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="OriginalPlaceOfIssue" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="15"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Endorsements" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="TicketIssuingAirline" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Airline which issued the Ticket. Needs to be passed, if available</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ExceptionType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To identify any exception fare – e.g. Bulk</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ARCNumber" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ARC Number for the Opaque Fares</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="7"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FareCalcLine" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>FareCalcLine used for every ticket in the request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BaseFareAmountDetails" type="tns:PriceType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="EquivalentFareAmountDetails" type="tns:PriceType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Details of Total amount customer paid</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TaxAmountDetails" type="tns:PriceType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Details of Total Tax amount customer paid</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TicketSurchargeDetails" type="tns:SurchargeDetailsType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Details of Surcharge Code and Surcharge Amount.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SegmentInfo" type="tns:SegmentInfoRequestType" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This complexType consists of the Segement Details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SegmentInfoRequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This complexType consists of the Segement Details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="EntitlementNumber" type="xsd:int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Entitlement Numbers for individual segments in the ticket/itinerary- This is the sequential # (Sabre: Entitlement #). For conjunctive tickets with 6 segments , this will be (1,2,3,4,5 and 6)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CouponNumber" type="xsd:int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Coupon# for individual segements.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SegDeparture" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Origin for each segment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SegArrival" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Destination for each segment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="OperatingCarrierCode" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MarketingCarrierCode" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Marketing Carrier for each segment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TicketDesignator" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="15"/> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MktgFlightNumber" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Mktg Flight Number for each segment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SegDepartureDate" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Flight Departure Date for each segment in DD-MON-YYYY format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="10"/> <xsd:maxLength value="11"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FareBasisCode" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fare Basis Code for each segment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="15"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PurchBkgCode" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Booking Code for each segment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="2"/> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SurchargeDetails" type="tns:SurchargeDetailsType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>YQ / YR surcharge – Needed if YQ/YR is applicable</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EarnCalculatroResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EarnCalculator Response Complex Type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="EarnCalculatorResponseStatus" type="tns:ResponseStatusType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Error Code returned from the Service in a successful response.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PassengerInfo" type="tns:PassengerInfoType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Passenger Information in the Response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="TicketInfoResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TicketResponseStatus" type="tns:ResponseStatusType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="TicketInformation" type="tns:TicketInformationType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="TicketMileageByEliteLevel" type="tns:MileageByEliteLevelType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="SegmentInfo" type="tns:SegmentInfoResponseType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SegmentInfoResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="SegmentResponseStatus" type="tns:ResponseStatusType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation/> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EntitlementNumber" type="xsd:int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sabre: Entitlement #. For conjunctive tickets with 6 segments , this should be (1,2,3,4,5 and 6) . Same as Request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CouponNumber" type="xsd:int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Coupon Number- Same as Request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SegDeparture" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Origin Airport Code for each segment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SegArrival" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Destination Airport Code for each segment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SegDepartureDate" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Departure Date for each segment in DD-MON-YYYY Format.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="10"/> <xsd:maxLength value="11"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AccrualType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Represents the Type Accrual Calculation – Revenue or Distance</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Revenue"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Distance"/> <xsd:minLength value="7"/> <xsd:maxLength value="8"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Other"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Ineligible"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AccrualReason" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Description of the Override applied for accrual Calculation</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FlightDistance" type="xsd:int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Airline Distance between Origin and Destination.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Revenue" type="xsd:float" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Prorated Revenue for the Segment flown.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ProratedYQYRRevenue" type="xsd:float" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Prorated amount for YQ/YR for the segment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="OverrideIndicator" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To indicate if Accrual calculation is different based on any Override at the setup level. Allowed values are "true" and "false".</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="true"/> <xsd:enumeration value="false"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="OverrideDistance" type="xsd:int" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Override Distance used in any specific case</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SegmentMileageByEliteLevel" type="tns:MileageByEliteLevelType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="DisplayEQDFlag" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Flag to indicate whether EQD has to be suppressed. This will be based on the EQD Go Live Date and Flight Date</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="true"/> <xsd:enumeration value="false"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServiceFaultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ErrorCode" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ErrorMessage" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ServiceFault" type="tns:ServiceFaultType"/> <xsd:complexType name="MileageByEliteLevelType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="EliteStatus" type="tns:EliteStatusType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PassengerInformationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="SabrePassengerNameNumber" type="xsd:float" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sabre PAX number. The Expected Values for Sabre passenger name-number are 1.1, 1.2…etc</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PassengerType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Passenger – ADT for Adult, CHD for Child, INF for Infant.If available, this can be sent – else it will be defaulted to Adult (ADT). 3 digit alpha numeric</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MemberNumber" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AAdvantage Number of the Member, if available - To be used for accrual calculation</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="7"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="IsAADVNumber" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is an identifier stating that member is not an advantage member at all so that Ventana will return 0 for the miles. The allowed values are "true", "false"</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="true"/> <xsd:enumeration value="false"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TicketRequestInfo" type="tns:TicketInfoRequestType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This – Needed if YQ/YR is applicable and not available at segment/Ticket</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="YQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="YR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="YQ/YR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Currency" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Amount" type="xsd:float" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sabre PAX number. eg. 1.1, 1.2…etc</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MemberNumber" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> in the request, eligible accrual for Member's elite level will be sent in the response.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TicketInfoResponse" type="tns:TicketInfoResponseType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Ticket Details in the Response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseStatusType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Code" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Represents the Error code of the response. name="TotalFareAmountDetails" type="tns:PriceType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>FareAmount in the Response -The Value would be Base Fare Amount + YQ/YR as </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TaxAmountDetailsinUSD" type="tns:PriceType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The US Equivalent Tax Amount at Ticket Level.The Value would be Total Tax - YQ/YR as applicable in USD</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EliteStatusType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="EliteStatus" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Elite level of the member – Can be used if the AAdvantage Number is blank to show eligible accrual for each elite level The values are Regular, Gold, Platinum, Platinum Plus, Executive Platinum, Conceirge Key.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Z"/> <xsd:enumeration value="G"/> <xsd:enumeration value="P"/> <xsd:enumeration value="T"/> <xsd:enumeration value="E"/> Eligible Mileage Quantity at Ticket or Passenger</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EligibleMileageType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="EligibleQuantity" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Eligible Mileage calculated based on the Ventana Accrual rules</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MultiplierUsed" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Multiplier used to calculate Eligible Mileage</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Ping_Input" type="tns:Ping_InputType"/> <xsd:element base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Ping"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="TotalAwardEligibleMilesType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TotalAwardEligibleMiles" type="tns:TotalEligibleQuantityType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total Award Eligble Miles at the Segement Level</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BaseAwardEligibleMiles" type="tns:EligibleMileageType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BonusAwardEligibleMilesType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="BonusType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> Bonus"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Promo Bonus"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BonusMileage" type="tns:EligibleMileageType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"> def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def httpResponseHeaders = context.testCase.testSteps["BGT Fulfillment Request"].testRequest.response.responseHeaders def httpStatus = httpResponseHeaders["#status#"] def httpStatusCode = (httpStatus =~ "[1-5]\\d\\d")[0]
assert httpStatusCode == '500'
def response_description = context.expand( '${BGT Fulfillment Request#Response#$[\'Description\']}' ) assert response_description == 'Invalid Response json'

con:config.script:
def response_code = context.expand( '${Execute Update Loyalty member call#Response#declare namespace ns2=\'http://custhub.ct.aa.com/ManageLoyaltyMemberV2\'; //ns2:LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResponse[1]/LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResult[1]/LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResponseStatus[1]/Code[1]}' ) assert response_code == "8110001"
def response_message = context.expand( '${Execute Update Loyalty member call#Response#declare namespace ns2=\'http://custhub.ct.aa.com/ManageLoyaltyMemberV2\'; //ns2:LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResponse[1]/LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResult[1]/LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResponseStatus[1]/ProviderSystemInfo[1]/Message[1]}' ) assert response_message == "Successful Execution"

def miles_before_test = context.expand( '${Execute Ext Member Call#Response#declare namespace adv2=\'http://www.siebel.com/xml/ADVBGSMemberProfileInfoResponse\'; declare namespace adv=\'http://siebel.com/loyalty/ADVBGSMemberService\'; //adv:LoyaltyMemberProfile_Output[1]/adv2:ExtMemberProfileInfoResponse[1]/Ext_LoyaltyMemberProfileResponse[1]/AwardMilesBalance[1]}' ) def miles_after_test = context.expand( '${Execute Ext Member Call - Again#Response#declare namespace adv2=\'http://www.siebel.com/xml/ADVBGSMemberProfileInfoResponse\'; declare namespace adv=\'http://siebel.com/loyalty/ADVBGSMemberService\'; //adv:LoyaltyMemberProfile_Output[1]/adv2:ExtMemberProfileInfoResponse[1]/Ext_LoyaltyMemberProfileResponse[1]/AwardMilesBalance[1]}' ) def milesQuantity = context.expand( '${#TestCase#milesQuantity}' )
log.info(miles_before_test) log.info(miles_after_test) log.info(milesQuantity)
assert Integer.parseInt(milesQuantity) == Integer.parseInt(miles_after_test) - Integer.parseInt(miles_before_test)

def responseCode = context.expand( '${Execute Update Loyalty member call#Response#declare namespace ns2=\'http://custhub.ct.aa.com/ManageLoyaltyMemberV2\'; //ns2:LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResponse[1]/LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResult[1]/LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResponseStatus[1]/ProviderSystemInfo[1]/Code[1]}' ) def responseMessage = context.expand( '${Execute Update Loyalty member call#Response#declare namespace ns2=\'http://custhub.ct.aa.com/ManageLoyaltyMemberV2\'; //ns2:LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResponse[1]/LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResult[1]/LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResponseStatus[1]/ProviderSystemInfo[1]/Message[1]}' )
def responseCodeDataSource = context.expand( '${Execute Update Loyalty member call#Response#declare namespace ns2=\'http://custhub.ct.aa.com/ManageLoyaltyMemberV2\'; //ns2:LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResponse[1]/LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResult[1]/LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResponseStatus[1]/ProviderSystemInfo[1]/Code[1]}' ) def responseMessageDataSource = context.expand( '${Execute Update Loyalty member call#Response#declare namespace ns2=\'http://custhub.ct.aa.com/ManageLoyaltyMemberV2\'; //ns2:LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResponse[1]/LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResult[1]/LoyaltyMemberMilesUpdateResponseStatus[1]/ProviderSystemInfo[1]/Message[1]}' )
assert responseMessage ==responseMessageDataSource assert responseCode == responseCodeDataSource
